content:
I'm looking at an email with subject:

CARIN Health Plan Workgroup 0620 2020 - "$assemble-eob" operation

Is the idea that a new $assemble-eob operation is being defined as part of the ballot reconciliation process?

Here's some of the history @Josh Mandel https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/204607-CARIN-Blue.20Button.20IG/topic/Call.20Recaps/near/201433465

We'll discuss more today and if we need to make changes, we will.
